title: How do I enter recovery mode and restore my phone to its factory settings?
answer: [when your phone is powered off, simultaneously press and hold the power and volume up buttons to enter recovery mode. In recovery mode, press the volume up and volume down buttons to scroll through the options, and press the power button to select an option.]() [ To restore your phone to its factory settings, go to Settings and touch Backup & reset > Factory data reset > Reset phone.]()
